root.title: mcdowel ME TO merger with interpharm inc
root.body: mcdowel enterpris inc say sign definit agreement acquir 80 pct interest privat held interpharm inc 19.9 pct interest mcdowel the compani say subject contig includ futur sale profit level mcdowel could four-year period acquir 100 pct interpharm exchang 51 pct mcdowel vote stock It say transact expect complet within 60 day time mcdowel board would restructur includ interpharm manag
